Enums/AlertBannerLevel.html.name: AlertBannerLevel
Enums/AlertBannerLevel.html.abstract: Pass this when presenting an error to define the color and log level of a message

Global Variables.html#/s:11AlertBanner05.name: alertBannerFont
Global Variables.html#/s:11AlertBanner05.abstract: Font to use on the label in the alert banner.

Global Variables.html#/s:11AlertBanner05.name: alertBannerTextColor
Global Variables.html#/s:11AlertBanner05.abstract: Text color, will be used on all three banner backgrounds.

Global Variables.html#/s:11AlertBanner07.name: offlineAlertBannerMessage
Global Variables.html#/s:11AlertBanner07.abstract: Message to display when calling showOfflineError(). Provide your own NetworkOfflineErrorLabel in Localizable.strings

Global Variables.html#/s:11AlertBanner05.name: alertBannerDisplayTime
Global Variables.html#/s:11AlertBanner05.abstract: How long the banner will stay visible.

Global Variables.html#/s:11AlertBanner05.name: alertBannerAnimationTime
Global Variables.html#/s:11AlertBanner05.abstract: How long the slide up/down will take.

Global Variables.html#/s:11AlertBanner9c.name: customLog
Global Variables.html#/s:11AlertBanner9c.abstract: Provide a handler if you want to log in a different way than default print()

Classes/AlertBanner.html#/s:11AlertBanne.abstract: Use the manager singleton to display errors

Classes/AlertBanner.html.name: AlertBanner
Classes/AlertBanner.html.abstract: Use the AlertBanner.manager to display errors. You don’t need to create your own instance.
